content.en: Optimizing stabilizers: Researchers have been investigating the use of algorithms to optimize the design of power system stabilizers. One such algorithm, called particle swarm optimization, is being employed to search for the best settings of these stabilizers. Other algorithms, such as genetic algorithms and modified particle swarm optimization, are also being explored for their potential in improving the design and tuning of power system stabilizers.
content.da: Optimering af stabilisatorer: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at optimere designet af kraftsystemstabilisatorer. En sådan algoritme, kaldet partikel-sværm- optimering, bliver brugt til at finde de bedste indstillinger af disse stabilisatorer. Andre algoritmer, såsom genetiske algoritmer og modificeret partikel-sværm-optimering, bliver også udforsket for deres potentiale til at forbedre designet og justeringen af kraftsystemstabilisatorer.
